website_summaries.verdict: Good value in a pliers set with four different tools. Each piece in the set is able to perform a different function.
pros: Pliers set from a trusted tool manufacturer at an excellent price
Slip-resistant grips will ensure successful completion of jobs
Collection of pliers works great for a homeowner who needs to complete different jobs
Pliers move easily, yet hold a tight grip throughout the job
Good size of pliers throughout the set
cons: Susceptible to rust if exposed to poor weather
Not meant for heavy-duty professional jobs

customer_reviews.title: Quality set that feels heavy and as made it through 10 months of house remodeling
customer_reviews.text: I'm rewiring my 1892 house and this set has been SO nice to work with. The linesman pliers are the work horse of the bunch, but I've used them all to rip out and replace my first floor wiring. They are all solid and feel heavy and the grip on them has stayed on after 10 months of weekly use. If I lost these, I would definitely buy the same pack again.
customer_reviews.author: rcasiano

customer_reviews.title: The ones I received were black metal instead of silver like the pic
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He loves them. The ones we got were black metal instead of silver, tho. Makes me wonder if they are fakes. However, so far they have performed well. Have not tried anything too tough yet so we will see...
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Nice tools
customer_reviews.text: Good heft. I've had them for a while, used a few times, and coated them in wd-40 when I first got them. Other than typical usage they are in tip top shape and get the jobs done. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Pro opine-er

customer_reviews.title: Nice tools
customer_reviews.text: Great set of Pliers and cutters. Look almost the same as the old set I have had for forty-five years. The old set is good enough still, but I decided I needed a new set for my birthday. I have used the dikes and the side cutters and they produced nice clean cuts on three wire extention cords I had to repair with new ends. Good tools.
customer_reviews.author: Nashoba Losa

customer_reviews.title: Make sure about the size before you hit "purchase"!
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot bigger than I had in mind when I ordered them! Please make sure to check the size before you do.. They are kind of huge, which makes them serious work pliers for a handyman more than just simple stuff around the house. I have small hands, so they are not that good for me. Otherwise they are a pretty nice set of pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Chu H. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Stanley does good work.
customer_reviews.text: In rating an Amazon purchased screwdriver I said that it wasn't an item most people could love (unless burdened by the rare screwdriver fetish), like, or hate. I pretty much feel the same way about pliers, but this set appears well made, and I like having them around. I used two recently to open a small plastic container -- that says more about my haplessness than it does the pliers and doesn't add much about the quality of these tools. But I did finally get the carton open with their help.
customer_reviews.author: ancientmariner

customer_reviews.title: Okay Pliers
customer_reviews.text: These pliers were okay, except for the basic one, which was not tightened enough, I guess. They did not feel right and were very loose. Amazon will give me 40% off since I did not want to return them all. The plastic was very hard to open and I had to finally use the blade I bought w/plastic or ceramic blades. Amazing how it works without cutting your hand with light use. I don't care too much for the bright yellow color.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Starks

customer_reviews.title: Good tools at a resonable price
customer_reviews.text: I am creating tool boxes for my grandchildren and some neices / nephews. The Stanley tools seem to provide a decent quality at a reasonable price. So far, Amazon and Stanley have gotten the majority of my tool purchases for my grandchildre. My grandchildren don't need, and I don't want to pay for, top tier professional tools; but low end tools are often a poor bargin. This seem to fill the middle niche nicely.
customer_reviews.author: CU Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pliers on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent heavy duty set of pliers. They have no play in the hinges yet move easily without sticking. The handles are great so far and haven't slipped or tried to fall off. They are also easy to with or without gloves. The side cutters and needle nose are my most used and work great. The side cutters cut 12 gauge residential wiring easily and twisted copper wire without leaving uncut strands. The needlenose are great little grippers. This is a very cook set of pliers for the money and I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: They all seem great. I did add a smaller needle nose and will probably get a larger thinner one for tighter spaces.
customer_reviews.author: John M Voss

customer_reviews.title: Great tools!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase and quality is great. Have been using them for a while with no problem. I would recommend this set!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty pliers for a great price but don't fit my original need. I wanted a matching set for a small house kit so I don't have to go digging around in the garage. These are bigger than expected and will end up being the garage set instead. They seem to be really great pliers and will probably work just fine for you. You'll see in the pictures that they're pretty big for my small hand. I've also included a comparison to couple other pliers we already have (a Kobalt, in blue and Stanley, in red), which are closer to the size I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyInTX

customer_reviews.title: They do their job.
customer_reviews.text: I use the cutters frequently on 4ga and some times 1/0 wire(multiple cuts needed.) They do their job. The pliers are decent and don't change sizes on you. The needle nose are fairly big but if you're working on larger equipment then won't be an issue really. Only issue was the grip on one piece was coming off. Just used some sealant I had and it works fine now.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: five stars
customer_reviews.text: I've got other tools before, and that's exactly what I lack. The key is that I'm happy to have chosen this one for the same kind of product from Amazon. Quality and price are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: susam

customer_reviews.title: Just what this grandma needed
customer_reviews.text: Somehow when my things were moved to an assisted living center, my tool box was left behind. I am gradually replacing the tools I find most necessary, nd good pliers are right at the top of my list. I like the feel and weight of these tools. I find the grips on the handles a very nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These tools have come in handy too many times to count! They have been so valuable to have, and I use them on at least a weekly basis.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Bartel

customer_reviews.title: Excelllent Quality - Good price
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely some heavy duty pliers - too big almost for what I will use them for (motorcycle work, general household use), but only because with the size comes a little bit extra weight and I'm a woman so smaller hands. The quality is there though so if you need some pliers that can withstand some serious use, these would be great.
customer_reviews.author: ---- Covarrubias

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting smaller sized tools. Upon receiving these, I was amazed at how large they were. The picture here looks deceiving. However, I am glad they are larger than I thought. They are sturdy and seem durable. I love Stanley tools. My only concern is that I received two of the same. But it is not a big deal really. Great for around the home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Good weight, very comfortable, & durable! Be sure to mist with a light coat of WD40 between uses 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pliers set. Good set for average home owner.
customer_reviews.author: TooTired2Shop

customer_reviews.title: very surprised and good enough for now
customer_reviews.text: I know where they were made and bought them anyway to carry in a boat box. (I coat them well with wd) and am surprised at the craftsmanship of the set I got. very surprised and good enough for now.
customer_reviews.author: chris p.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Well made pliers purchased for the toolbox on my pickup. These should last my lifetime unless they get run over by a dozer. I did place a small drop of oil on each to allow for smoother open/shut, as they were delivered as dry as a bone.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Shook

customer_reviews.title: Real Quality Tools
customer_reviews.text: This set is a big upgrade to my tool set. Very good quality and built tough
customer_reviews.author: juvaughn powell

customer_reviews.title: Good Pliers at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm always leaving my pliers in weird places and had completely lost nearly all of them so I bought this Stanley set as a replacement for four of them. These seem to be well made and not at all poorly made. To really give a full review I will have to wait a year and see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome heavy duty set. the pliers work well and are a nice addition to any home tool box. This set will handle anything except channel lock type applications. Very very nice to have on hand and high quality you know you are holding a tool and not some piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Gryphon

customer_reviews.title: ... low but I received this set and they are nice. they are heavy duty and look real nice
customer_reviews.text: I was leary about the price because it was so low but I received this set and they are nice.they are heavy duty and look real nice. Used the pliers and clippers at work today and really like the feel of them. The cutters are nice and sharp
customer_reviews.author: kevin henson

customer_reviews.title: ... a little more beefy than necessary but these are great sturdy tools
customer_reviews.text: The handles are a little more beefy than necessary but these are great sturdy tools.
customer_reviews.author: Skribbs

customer_reviews.title: great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great set of pliers. The lyman pliers could be a little bigger but I mostly bought it for the needlenose, snippers, and regular pliers. Good thick quality handles. no issues in the 2 years ive owned them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Quality is the standard with these guys
customer_reviews.text: Never had a bad tool from these guys. If anything rusts or breaks I can call them and they replace it for life! It's just the loosing factor I can't seem to find my tools
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I've used them several times already and am pleased with the grip, the weight of the pliers, and they do the job nicely. The snips cut well.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great set for all-around home work
customer_reviews.text: Nice set for all-around home work. Good quality, especially for the price. I had this set for a couple of months now and use it all the time for various tasks at my new home. Long nose pliers - must have for electric/wiring tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Trespassers W

customer_reviews.title: and they look great.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet. They're built strong, and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: A nice set of pliers for my garage
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of pliers for my garage. All surfaces align accurately and the pliers function smoothly. No problems. They are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C. Pacanowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Set - Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set for the price, saved a lot of money over buying these tools in the local store, quality is great and should work well for just about anybody
customer_reviews.author: John Henry James

customer_reviews.title: Stanley pliers
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of large pliers set. The recipient loved them
customer_reviews.author: Gripper

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, especially for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, especially for the money. I use them for around the house odds and ends and they work great! More than I need for that really, but for this price ya can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JimJN1

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This set of pliers an side cutter is well made and stands up to the quality that is expected from Stanley. They are, however, large and if you do not have fairly large hands you should probably purchase the smaller versions.
customer_reviews.author: Camp Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Tools for Home
customer_reviews.text: These will last my life time and then some if I don't lose then. Am going projects around the house, mostly small electrical jobs plus running speaker wire. These are heavy duty for home and have come in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: bmac32

customer_reviews.title: Very good pliers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have on hand at my vacation home (tired of lugging tools back and forth). Last weekend I the occasion to use most, they are really of good quality and at great price. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Never seem to have enough of the right tools handy. That's why I bought this set so I have extras within reach (hopefully).
customer_reviews.author: Curt Jingle

customer_reviews.title: Solid tools
customer_reviews.text: I think my ex-handyman took a lot of my tools. That's not so bad. My former pliers were old enough to vote. These ones are nice, solid and rust free.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Good pliers
customer_reviews.text: Nice pliers love the yellow handles for finding them when set them down mid-job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L Shields

customer_reviews.title: They are very sturdy, but just feel too big to use most ...
customer_reviews.text: I find that these are larger than needed. They are very sturdy, but just feel too big to use most of the time. I find myself using other tools instead.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much I bought another set for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this set in my mechanic to box that I used for many automotive repairs. I liked it so much I bought another set for my HVAC tool bag.
customer_reviews.author: D.Graham

customer_reviews.title: One Tough Set of Pliers
customer_reviews.text: When you get the blister pack that these pliers come packed in and feel how heavy it is, you realize that these are no lightweight tools. They are thick and heavy with steel, and look like they will last forever, certainly longer than I will.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Strippy

customer_reviews.title: Average tools
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it four stars base appond my personal opinion and experience and handling of other tool manufacturers, they're not klein or Greenlee but they get the job done it's a good deal for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These have held up to a lot of use and I'm really happy with this set. For them to still be kicking over a year later in my line of work is great. Good value for your money!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a good set of tools for miscellaneous tasks around the house. I purchased numerous Stanley tools with a gift card I received. Then I went on Amazon to find the rest of the pieces I wanted. These tools are very good quality and conservatively priced. I have more pieces on my wish list that I will be buying in the future. I appreciate their great customer service and timely shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to order these due to the Stanley name. We sent them back after seeing them, the quality was very poor, example, the needle nose pliers do not even touch each other to get a good grip. The wire cutters were the same and could not cut the wire due to a sizable gap between the snippers :( disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gardener101

customer_reviews.title: Good tools, but they rust really easily
customer_reviews.text: Good tools, but they rust really easily. Coat them whit cosmoline or Vaseline when you receive them to prevent rust.
customer_reviews.author: MelB

customer_reviews.title: 4-piece pliers set
customer_reviews.text: Stanley 4-piece pliers set is a great addition to my tool box for small mechanical jobs in the garage. Like the American made and lifetime warranty offered on these tools
customer_reviews.author: gentlman4u

customer_reviews.title: Four piece Plier set
customer_reviews.text: Great workmanship. Good Price. Super Quality tools. These will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ikerry

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. They are bright enough to help reduce the chance of me losing them. I will lose them anyways, so I will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great General Set for Garage or Shop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to keep in my garage to tackle everything from automotive to simple home fixes. The quality has surpassed my expectations and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Class Act

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money ! Go Stanley !!!
customer_reviews.text: Stanley has never disappointed with the quality of their products ! If you don't have any tools and need to buy quality, long lasting products, you can't go wrong with STANLEY.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Morgado

customer_reviews.title: Fine tools. Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Fine tools. Get what you pay for, you can tell in the picture what they are, nothing more. No springs, I'd suggest going for springed tools. Great price
customer_reviews.author: akabaka

customer_reviews.title: Good value tools for the home.
customer_reviews.text: Good value tools for the home. Do not know fomr a professional POV.
customer_reviews.author: Cityboy Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Stanley is a good product and this is a very good set of ...
customer_reviews.text: Stanley is a good product and this is a very good set of tools for an excellent price. You will not be sorry for buying these. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: These are big tools and I like that. They may not fit smaller hands
customer_reviews.text: These are big tools and I like that. They may not fit smaller hands. They feel like they will outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: Das Dewayne

customer_reviews.title: Good set of pliers
customer_reviews.text: These are just a bit larger than I would have preferred. Hazards of ordering online, I guess. They seem solid and I'll use them. I do like the grip material.
customer_reviews.author: Shane H.

customer_reviews.title: Simple functional tool set
customer_reviews.text: These tools appear bigger than the picture, they are not the smaller set. Looks pretty durable and works on a few of my projects. A simple and working tool set.
customer_reviews.author: Judson Chung

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality tools.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tools, better for a larger hand (sorry Don) exceptional for the price.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. A little larger than I imagined but ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. A little larger than I imagined but I find myself pulling them more than anything else rewiring my house.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: These were a gift for my son along with another ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son along with another set of tools. I figure I can just keep building on his tool set. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: Plastic coated handles
customer_reviews.text: I would have rather these pliers had a rubbery feel to the handles over the hard plastic feel but other than that they seem to be an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Quality Tools
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this pliers set for a couple weeks but have already found them useful in several situations. These pliers are fairly large, they may be too big if you have small hands. I found the size to be a perfect fit. The build quality is great, these feel like they will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDweller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Tools will enjoy having these in your tool box
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Good quality set with a nice substantial feel
customer_reviews.text: Good quality set with a nice substantial feel. Better quality than the store brands I have purchased in the past for the same price
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as part of an emergency repair tool kit ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as part of an emergency repair tool kit for my Chevy Avalanche. Haven't used them yet and hope I don't ever need them.
customer_reviews.author: snakecatcher2000

customer_reviews.title: Nice pliers set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of pliers for home repairs. This is a variety of pliers to use in the home for different kinds of uses. It's nice to see them all in one set.
customer_reviews.author: Hug1

customer_reviews.title: Homeowners must
customer_reviews.text: Has the most common plier configurations you'll need. They're good quality and price effective. Highly recommend. The cutters are very effective.
customer_reviews.author: sirnatesalot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! Got it on sale during Black Friday. Everyone needs a good set of pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Pliers
customer_reviews.text: The Stanley pliers are high quality and strong. They are very good for maintenance. the price is reasonable. They will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Just excellent, really wonderful, this set of pliers Stanley is really what I expected ... perfect for setting quality electrical work. And not to mention the price, all excellent. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jerbrayn Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good price, well made, have several sets around the house because you always need pliers/cutters for something
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Burton

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of pliers
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made very happy with the quality time will tell if they last it is a shame it could not be made her IN THE USA
customer_reviews.author: MANNIX 33

customer_reviews.title: Easier for visually impaired to locate when set down.
customer_reviews.text: The dikes don't cut well other than that no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA.LANDRY

customer_reviews.title: Man Sized
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these because they fit perfectly in his largish hands and get the job done. Was a great price for quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Lea

customer_reviews.title: Got Tools!
customer_reviews.text: One can never have enough tools for around the house 'Honey-do." Now I am saving up money to get me a nice Craftsman tool box to put everything in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it. I would spend a little more and ...
customer_reviews.text: Clumsy tools. Cheaply Chinese made. I wouldn't recommend it. I would spend a little more and get quality ones.
customer_reviews.author: thomas p.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Suckers
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly sturdy. Not toys. Should last a good long time. Each does what it is designed to do. No complaint from me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: This is a great option. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option. Good quality, fair pricing and durable enough for consistent use on a variety of projects.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: great delivery and very useful tools. looks solid in design always trusted stanley when it comes to tools to be use around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Trieu

customer_reviews.title: These are STANLEY Tools
customer_reviews.text: These are STANLEY tools. What more needs to be said other than that this is a super price on this quality pliers set!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good pliers. The best I could find after a lot of research
customer_reviews.author: Minimalist

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I don't know much about tools, but these were a gift for my husband who seems to think they are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Versus

customer_reviews.title: Different sizes
customer_reviews.text: These equipment are really good. They have different sizes work with everything you would use with. I absolutely recommand it.
customer_reviews.author: Amri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they were all big no small ones i still needed a small one. But they are great
customer_reviews.author: elora prettyman

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy-to-use tools. Steel I liked it. Well seasoned material, which makes it possible to work without thinking that it is you can do. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin1989

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Stanley 4-Piece Pliers Set is a really good deal and the quality isn't that bad either. Good for around the house and whatever else you can think of to do lol. Stanley is a good product and by no means craftsman or snap-on but nobody is claiming that. If you need them buy them...you won't regret it. I would definitely recommend and buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality craftsmanship is worth the price...particularly for such "must have" tools.
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Somebody stole my electric kit and I had to start over. These are pretty nice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: fixNstuff

customer_reviews.title: Decent set.
customer_reviews.text: Items are physically large than expected. Feels like a decent set for the money. I will be the occasional user at best.
customer_reviews.author: Big B

customer_reviews.title: Value purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like stanly tools for home use. They are one of the least expensive but have a little weight behind them. Perfect for fixit jobs around the house
customer_reviews.author: Desri Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This are the larger size plier set at 8 - 10" long.
customer_reviews.author: L. Adams

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This 4-piece pliers set is a quality product well made and I'm very satisfied with the purchase. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: All of the tools are high quality, and made an awesome gift to my dad. They're bright and easy to find, and grip...effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Durable Plier Set
customer_reviews.text: Needed a variety of pliers/cutters and this set fits the bill. Very durable and work like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Flg

customer_reviews.title: Great set of pliers
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pliers. I bought them as a second set of tools to keep in my backyard storage shed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid, all that you need.Very Good price for the quality offered. Buy it with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Alaq11

product_meta.title: Stanley 84-058 4-Piece Pliers Set
product_meta.description:
Unit Count:1Machined jaws help grip items securely. Cutting pliers feature induction-hardened cutting edges for long life. This four-piece plier set (84-026, 028, 029, 032) includes: 8-inch slip joint, 7-inch diagonal, .8-inch lineman, and 8-inch long nose.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Machined jaws help grip items securely. Cutting pliers feature induction-hardened cutting edges for long life. This four-piece plier set (84-026, 028, 029, 032) includes: 8-inch slip joint, 7-inch diagonal, .8-inch lineman, and 8-inch long nose.
feature_bullets: Stanley four-piece pliers set with rubberized slip-resistant grips
Machined jaws help grip items securely
Cutting pliers feature induction-hardened cutting edges for long life
Includes 8-inch slip joint, 7-inch diagonal, .8-inch lineman, and 8-inch long nose

specifications.Warranty Description: Stanley warrants this product to the original purchaser for its useful life against deficiencies in material and workmanship. This LIMITED LIFETIME WARRANTY does not cover products that are improperly used, abused, altered or repaired. Deficient products will be replaced or repaired.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars574 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
